name: @volkovasystem/concise-event
description: Event and emitter that concisely works.

scripts.clean: rm -rf ./node_modules || true && rm -fv ./package-lock.json || true && npm cache clean --force
scripts.reset: npm run clean && rm -rfv ./callback-once.js || true && rm -rfv ./.build || true && rm -rfv ./.test || true
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run compress && npm run resolve
scripts.stage: npm run reset && npm install && npm run build && npm test && npm run clean

author: Richeve S. Bebedor <richeve.bebedor@gmail.com>
